recipeList.directions: Directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and pasta and sauté for 3 minutes. Add salt, black pepper, and garlic powder and sauté for an additional 3 minutes. Serve warm.
recipeList.ingredients: Ingredients: 1 cup cooked chicken, 1/2 cup cooked pasta, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1 tablespoon garlic powder.

recipeList.directions: Directions: Cook bacon in a frying pan until crispy. Crack eggs into the frying pan and scramble until desired consistency. Serve together.
